title: Can I use my TalkBand B2 without my phone?
answer:
After the initial pairing, your TalkBand B2 will sync time settings from your phone. You can then use your TalkBand B2 on it's own to track fitness activities or sleep patterns. (You canÂ enable smart alarms and activity reminders in the Huawei Wear application.) 

 Calling, music, data synchronization, and other features require the use of a phone
